channel.title: List of Common Fake claims for each class
channel.description:
Idea spark!
I'm gonna write common fake claims in order to bring attention to them when fighting scum like this.
**Mastermind** * Princess * Sheriff * Observer (risky)
**Assassin** * Knight * Court wizard * Hunter * physician
**Reaper** * Knight * Physician
**Sellsword** * Butler * Mercenary (risky)
**Inqusitor** * Paladin * Sheriff
**Sorcerer** * Knight * Physician
**Possessor** * Hunter * Knight
If there's others I missed let me know

item.title: List of Common Fake claims for each class
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
For inq, add alch and CW or something… not all for them claim the investigative j the game. Some inqs just straight up claim Inquisitor as well

Also, as reaper, I try to avoid the common reaper claims once they know it’s a reaper game so I like to claim Hunter (lol again) and princess

Read full topic
item.source: List of Common Fake claims for each class

item.title: List of Common Fake claims for each class

item.description:
Planterror:

Sorcerer

  • Knight
  • Physician

Eh if it was pre-rework Sorcerer then I would probably put Sheriff/Paladin.

item.description:
Claims for every class:

4.Did I said Knight?
5.See point above.

item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Poss:
Knight
Hunter(less common now)
Butler
Noble(risky)
Anything they can jump and frame someone as and whatever they jump into

Sorcerer:
Hunter
Physician
Alch
Knight
CW

item.description:
I usually claim phys (or risk the hunter if I haven’t had to claim until late game and hunter probably isn’t in the game) as MM cause sheriff claims are super suspicious late game

item.title: List of Common Fake claims for each class
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
Assassin can literally fake anything since it doesn’t matter that much as long a the mm keeps converting. Hunter is also common, as is the occasional physician. I prefer claiming princess as assassin if my MM isn’t

Read full topic
